评论详情: The color is a pretty Merlot and it’s soft as well as textured. Love.

I love the color, texture and fit of this sweater. The sleeves are knit in a way that there are openings (see pic), it gives a delicate feminine feel to the sweater. It is a nice weight, drapes/fits nicely on the body. Doesn’t cling but isn’t baggy. It is soft, didn’t get any pulls, and washed nicely. It is of good quality.
This shows as bright White but it's cream. Disappointed 😔
Soft, lightweight, nice shaping but runs large. Do not order up.
I love this sweater and the sleeves are so cute.  The material is super soft and feels great.
I dislike that the fabric catches easily and it looks awful
This is so soft and cozy and flattering!

评论概述: Cute but pills within a day
评论详情: I was so excited for this lightweight sweater - great fit, color, and texture. BUT it started to pill over the chest area within a day of wear. This material is not meant to last. Returned it.

评论概述: Exactly as picture. Beautiful, soft, lightweight and true to size.
评论详情: I just got it delivered. I got burgundy in XL. . For reference: I am 5.7 tall, around 200 lb and XL and it's just prefect. Looks exactly as pictured. The material is soft, lightweight and runs true to size. It's not oversized sweater. Planning to order at least in one more color. Great product. Happy with a purchase. Recommend it. I will add my pictures later.
True to size.  Love how soft it is.  It washes well

Overall, a good sweater. The sleeves are weird. The knit pattern has holes that you can easily see through. Like bug enough to put my pinky through.  So if it is cold, you will need to have a shirt under it.
The colors are beautiful. I ordered it in two colors. Very pretty and stylish. Also, it is soft and cozy.

Extremely soft, perfect fit, adorable!! When I say soft, like butter or your favorite blanket. I normally wear an XL and like my clothes loose fitting, it fits perfectly as expected. The details are so cute and parchment color is subtle and nice. It's not super heavy or hot which I appreciate. Will be ordering more! Hope it holds up after washing.

Purchased for family Christmas party.  Was not hot while running around cooking, games and cleanup.  Highly recommend.  Very soft and nice coverage over belly and bum.  5’8” XXL.  220lbs. Recommend washing on delicate stand alone to avoid piles and air dry.
The fabric seemed like it would snag a little bit but otherwise it's super comfy and fits great. It seems like the right weight where you won't get too hot in a warmer office.

评论概述: The sweaters are smaller than the mentioned size
评论详情: I usually order the small size and after seeing the measurements in the size chart, ordered small. When tried after receiving the product, it runs as tight fitted Otherwise, the color and the texture of the sweater is good Will return the item

I ordered this sweater in a burgandy size large.  Large is my normal size.  That one fit perfectly.  I tried to order the pink one n a large but it was HUGE.  It was labeled large but was clearly much bigger than the burgandy large.  I returned it and tried again.  Again the pink one came HUGE.  I tried to order a medium.  Thought I'd try that.  That one seems to have gotten lost and has never arrived.  I love the sweater if I can get it in the right size.
Every day wear and or for a  dressy day! Love this sweater! Great quality and as advertised! No shrinkage after washed!

I bought 2 of these sweaters in different colors and I really like them.  They are very comfortable, true to size without being too clingy and look nice for Fall/Winter paired with some boots.  I highly recommend them.

This sweater is well made and very flattering. I ordered it in black and plan to order another color. The fabric is soft and the sleeve design adds a unique look to the sweater. It fits true to size. I ordered a medium. The sleeves are long enough and the fit is not too tight.
I love this sweater! I got the sage green, it's so pretty. Really soft and light weight and so comfy. I will probably get it in some other colors.

I don’t realize the sleeves had holes, so those are see through its not a design. Fit as expected, I washed it and it stayed in tact. Decided to keep since I get hot flashes, the holes will help keep me cool lol.
Great product, exactly what I was expecting based on the description! Fits true to size

Love this sweater. I ended up returning the sweater because of the color.  Not a color I usually wear but I thought I would give it a try!  That said,  I bought another one in a different color and have had so many compliments.  It is super soft and warm.  Great quality for the price.

评论概述: Loved it til I washed it
评论详情: It’s a beautiful sweater but it pills a lot even though I only wash it by itself on delicate cycle and air dry it.
Love this sweater! Super cute soft and comfortable sweater! I get a lot of compliments when I wear this! True to size
Wasn’t too tight and was very comfortable
I did not expect this good as a quality sweater! I absolutely love this sweater. It was perfect for my family photos!
I love everything about this sweater!  the color is a great deep green, it fits nice, and is very flattering. I'm already looking good at the other colors so I can buy more!!
Love this design and extremely comfortable, warm. Great style!

This sweater seems to fit true to size and is very stylish. The sleeves are a looser knit and are see through but the rest of the body is a tighter knit. I don’t think I will be wearing often in colder months but it is a great transitional sweater to get through the fall.
I have washed it twice so far and still soft. My go to sweater, will order more colors. Sleeves are cute. It is pretty warm but not heavy. Ordered medium, true to size
It is of great quality and super cute! I'm a large, and it fits perfectly. It's true to size.
Nice sweater. Color was pretty and style was nice. Just found something similar and cheaper somewhere else otherwise I would have not returned it.

Ordered in 2 colors and I would order more. The texture is so soft and comfortable. I ordered a size up (S to M) because I like to wear sweater styles with leggings. I was looking for more stylish sweaters since my clients only see my top half during video sessions. The light green and lavender are beautiful.
this sweater is so lovely - I ordered the brown and I love, love, love it!!  thank you for the great quality!!
I normally wear an XXL, but that size was too big and just didn’t fit right. I got an XL and it fits very nicely. Love it!  Love the sleeves as they add a feminine touch.
Love the color and the fit was great.

评论概述: Very Soft and Medium Light Weight
评论详情: The perfect burgundy/wine color for the fall, the sweater is a nice medium-lightweight, perfect for under a blazer or layering with a color shirt underneath.
Loved it
Pretty and soft. Great fit. So glad I picked this one.
This sweater is so soft and comfortable. Fits true to size and is very flattering.

I ordered this sweater to start wearing with the cooler weather and I was so happy! It is great quality and so soft and comfy! It fits very nicely, though I wouldn't consider it oversized but its very flattering regardless!
Very soft, nice sweater. It runs a little small. If you want the oversized look, size up.

I love this sweater! The blackish green is gorgeous and looks amazing with jeans. I love that the sleeves are an open crochet/knit style and that the body of the sweater is not. It does have a pretty change in the pattern at the cuffs, hem, and upper bust/shoulders. It's lightweight, but it's not flimsy. It's so cozy and I've received compliments on it. I especially love that the crew neck isn't tight. So many sweaters have a high neck, which I loathe, but this is perfectly situated just at my collar bone. Price point seems fair, especially if it lasts more than a year. I washed in a mesh bag and laid flat to dry with no problems.
I got a lot of compliments on this one. Soft, flattering, perfect fit. I got the maroon one and it was adorable. I will purchase more colors
This sweater hits all the boxes! Light weight, super soft and extremely comfy. I came back to buy multiple colors.

I love Evaless!  This sweater is so pretty and soft.  The knit of the sleeve has such a pretty pattern.  It's very stretchy and true to size. I'm so excited to wear this now that fall weather is arriving.  It's the perfect fall color and weight.  Get this one, you won't be disappointed!
Love this sweater! It’s soft and warm and I have received many compliments when wearing it.

I ordered a large and I am 5’6” & 147 lbs and to me it seems a little tight in places. The material is decent quality for the price point. The material is soft and comfortable enough. I feel like the sweater is thicker and stiffer than what it appears to look like on the model. The black is a true black. I washed only in cold water with other darks. I only allowed to tumble dry for about 5 minutes at the most before laying it flat to dry the rest of the way. It is definitely warm enough and will meet my needs for a plain black pullover sweater.

I wear sweaters and jeans/leggings all winter long and was very excited to order this Cable Knit sweater. Although it doesn't say in the description, the material is a rayon/polyester-blend. Honestly, I was a little skeptical, but the fabric is so soft. I mean, really, really soft and comfortable. I ordered a large, which is a bit roomy, but fits nicely. I don't like wearing heavy sweaters and this sweater is perfect. Not too heavy or too light. I will definitely wear this sweater a lot during the upcoming winter months.

When I first opened up this sweater I was amazed at how soft it is!  Sure, the listing says it is soft, but I wasn't expecting it to be quite this nice.  It is extremely comfortable to wear.  Not only is the soft material gentle on the skin, but the fit is really nice.  It is shape forming, but not clingy.  It fits in a way that looks good, but still feels plenty roomy.  The sleeves are a pretty tight fit, but they stretch to fit correctly. so they aren't squeezing your arms.  I really love how long the sleeves are!  There are little breathing holes all down the arms so this is a perfect fall or indoor sweater.  The crewneck offers plenty of breathing room as well.  The green color I ordered is beautiful and I actually think it looks better in person.  I can't get over how soft this material is, so I am sure I will wear this one a lot when it gets a bit cooler.  It arrived in good condition and seems to be well stitched, so I hope it will hold up well.  I would highly recommend this one to others.

This Evaless casual sweater is perfect for fall or chilly summer nights. It is light weight, not too heavy or thick, and not too thin either, it's just perfect. Material is wonderful, soft and delightful to wear alone or with/under a romper or jeans/leggings/yoga pants. Color is a wonderful muted smoke grey. Overall I'm very happy with this and highly recommend!
The material is so soft and comfortable! It’s thick but not too thick. Perfect for fall. I got the green and it looks as pictured. Can’t wait for cooler days to wear this !

I really like this light sweater.  I would not describe it as oversized, it seems to fit me as expected for a size small.  Its very soft and stretchy and has a lot of nice detailing in the stitching of the fabric.  The arms are open weave, so depending on the temperature you might opt for a shirt underneath.
Comfortable, soft sweater.  Fits true to size.  Ordered the large and it fits great.  I'm 5'9, 185 lbs, and typically wear a 10-12.
This sweater is very cute. I love the cutouts on the arms very small but breathable all at the same time. Very soft and lightweight material. Fits true to size.
Gorgeous sweater, soft and cozy material and lovely color. I really like the style and design. The different textures of the sleeves and neckline make it very flattering and eye catching.

This has to be one of the softest sweater fabrics I’ve ever felt. This sweater is not only soft but it is warm and cozy. The netting pattern in the sleeves sets this sweater apart. I love the color too. It is very nice and well designed.  Great find to wear in the fall and winter. The fabric is delicate and I suggest taking care of this sweater so that little pills don’t start to form.  Glad I have this sweater. It gets two thumbs up!

评论概述: Flattering, cute design for this EVALESS women's sweater
评论详情: Love the design. Like the open weave crochet on the sleeves, some may not but you could easily wear an undershirt for colder temps if you are concerned. I think sometimes sweaters are TOO warm in the in between seasons (ie a warm fall day too warm for sweaters but the colors are fall and you want the full vibe). This is a great sweater. I love the cut and how it frames. It's a winner.

I can’t wait for winter to wear this sweater, it’s crazy soft and snuggly. I got it in XXL to go for an oversized look and it’s not as big as I was hoping but that’s not really a problem it will still be cute. The sweater itself seems like high quality material and there’s no stray threads. Overall I wish it was a little bigger but thats just nit picking it’s a really nice sweater.

I love the gorgeous, deep green of this cable knit sweater! I like that the knit of the sleeves is different from the knit of the upper body and of the lower body, it adds a nice difference that is pleasing to the eye. The yarn is so soft and feels so good against my skin! The sizing is good, the stitching and hemming are perfect. This is an overall wonderful top that I am so happy to incorporate into my Autumn and Winter clothing!

I needed a new white sweater since most of mine either have stains or are just outdated.  This is a very cute and way soft sweater.  I thought the eyelet-like design of the sleeves wouldn't allow me to wear it past fall, but you hardly notice when wearing.
I can't wait for the weather to cool off because this sweater will be worn on repeat! The cut is great and the softness make it next level! Get it!

I really like this sweater.  The color is just as pictured and it is luxuriously soft.  I like the pattern detail on the sleeves.  This will be great with jeans or skirts.  The only issue I have with it is that it has a little snag on the front.  The smooth pattern of the body does not mask it well.
I followed the size chart and got the small and I  have never been a small!  I am 5'7,  120 pounds,  36B chest and the small fits me.

The fabric of this sweater is exquisitely soft and luxurious. The subtly see-through sleeves add a touch of uniqueness to the garment. It fits almost true to size, offering just the right amount of extra room without being overly loose. While I typically don't gravitate toward crewneck sweaters, the captivating pattern and design of this rich maroon sweater make it an enjoyable addition to my wardrobe.

评论概述: EVALESS Gorgeous And Soft, Beautifully Patterned, Long Sleeve Cable Knit Sweater!
评论详情: This sweater is so soft and beautiful! I thought that the displayed photo was pretty, but even the photo does not capture the beauty of this sweater. It's soft too; made of a very skin friendly vicose/polyester blend. This sweater is a crew neck pull on, and has vertical lines on the neck and upper portion of the sweater. The sleeve cuffs and hem are both ribbed, and a nice length (and I have long arms!) These long sleeves are sort of a "waffle" knit with small hollowed out sections that really add interest and elegance to the knit style. The sweater is also a great length; about 2-3 inches below my hips.  The deep cocoa brown color is also beautiful; a perfect color for the upcoming fall and winter seasons. The label indicates that this sweater can be machine washed- If doing so, I would suggest using a gentle cycle and a laundry bag to preserve the distinctive beauty of this sweater.  What a great value for a sweater that is premium quality and is expensive looking and feeling. This sweater pairs beautifully with jeans, dress slacks and skirts- It is a gorgeous and much cherished addition to my wardrobe!
